select * from item_type itemType
left join company com on itemType.company_id = com.company_id where 1=1
AND itemType.item_type_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWords}, '%')
AND com.company_id =#{companyId}
ORDER BY item_type_code desc

select * from item_type itemType
AND (itemType.item_type_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') or itemType.item_type_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') or itemType.memo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keywords}, '%') )
AND itemType.company_id =#{companyId}
ORDER BY itemType.item_type_id, itemType.item_type_code
